sensitivity: Color :1.0 lux (AGC on) , B/W : 0.5 lux (AGC on)
imagesetting: Brightness, Contrast, Hue, Saturation, Sharpness, AGC, Exposure, Shutter Speed adjustment, Sense-Up, D-WDR, Flip, Mirror, DNR
security: Password protection, IP address filtering, HTTPS encrypted data transmission, 802.1X port-based authentication for network protection, QoS/DSCP
browser: Microsoft IE 6.0 or above, Chrome, Safri, Firefox
